ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the Ministry of Health, Ministry of Agriculture, and Fisheries; the County Government of Kiambu; and Kenya Medical Research Institute for their participation in the implementation of the study. We acknowledge Penina Munyua and Clayton Onyango from the Centers for Disease Control and Preventionâ€”Kenya, for their technical assistance during the implementation of the study.

sec.title: Funding statement
sec.p: This work was funded with funds from the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases, National Institutes of Health (NIH), Department of Health and Human Services, contract no. HHSN266200700007C and Core Funding of the Global Disease Detection Division of US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

sec.title: Disclaimer
sec.p: The findings and conclusions in this manuscript are those of the authors and do not necessarily represent the official position of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases or US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention or the Government of Kenya.
